content:
# I successfully harvested 10 units of coal, and my inventory now contains coal. 
# The next step is to smelt this coal into usable energy and begin crafting essential items like iron plates.

# Since I need to smelt iron ore to create iron plates, I should locate a nearby iron ore resource. 
# After that, I can set up a furnace to smelt the iron ore once I gather it.

nearest_iron = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Finding the nearest iron ore resource.
print(f'Nearest iron position: {nearest_iron}')  # Displaying the position of the nearest iron ore.
